titleStmt.title: A proposal humbly offered to the King and Parliament, for raising a considerable sum of mony yearly to His Majesty. By James Lord Mordington, B. Whitelocke Esq; and Rich. Cotton cloth-worker.
titleStmt.author: Mordington, James Douglas, Lord, b. 1651.
Whitelocke, Bulstrode, b. 1647.
Cotton, Rich., cloth-worker.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
